name: Avis Budget EMEA Limited
goal: Representing the interests of the car rental and car sharing industry and raising awareness of the industry and the role this sector has to play in the wider mobility landscape.  Currently focussing on the cross border car registraion proposal, consumer protection, mobility and connected car, changes to the union customs code and the effect on the industry and insurance distribution.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Insurance distribution and financial services
Cross Border Car Registration
Data Protection
Consumer Rights
Connected Car and Access to Data
